name: Egg Egg Chicken
description:
This game is made for Ludumdare 52.

Harvest eggs! Get Cash!  Buy chicken!  Then harvest eggs!!  Get Cash!  Buy Items to protect your chicken !  Then HARVEST more eggs! # Click on eggs to harvest eggs. # Click on invading animals to attack them. # Click the button on the right to exchange eggs for money or buy more chickens. # Drag the tools below to use.
